[source, python]
----
resp = client.security.put_role_mapping(
    name="basic_users",
    roles=[
        "user"
    ],
    rules={
        "any": [
            {
                "field": {
                    "dn": "cn=John Doe,cn=contractors,dc=example,dc=com"
                }
            },
            {
                "field": {
                    "groups": "cn=users,dc=example,dc=com"
                }
            }
        ]
    },
    enabled=True,
)
print(resp)
----
